title: Would you be okay with a camera and mic placed in your home by the government?

guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

⁉️ No loaded questions.

post.title: Would you be okay with a camera and mic placed in your home by the government?

author.bio: Why are you trying to go through my shit? Fuck off!
author.bio_html: Why are you trying to go through my shit? Fuck off!

body: Ehhh, I limit the amount of willfully bought surveillance as much as I can. One phone is better than a computer that is always on, a bunch of Alexas, cloud based security cameras, smart tv, etc.
body_html: Ehhh, I limit the amount of willfully bought surveillance as much as I can. One phone is better than a computer that is always on, a bunch of Alexas, cloud based security cameras, smart tv, etc.

post.title: Would you be okay with a camera and mic placed in your home by the government?

author.bio:
some people just want to watch the world learn

1 Corinthians 13:12
author.bio_html:
some people just want to watch the world learn

1 Corinthians 13:12

body:
Absolutely not. Privacy is a fundamental right and necessary to be able to live with liberty

And for the "nothing to hide crowd" if any are out there, I highly recommend this piece: https://thenextweb.com/news/read-this-if-youve-got-nothing-to-hide
body_html:
Absolutely not. Privacy is a fundamental right and necessary to be able to live with liberty

And for the "nothing to hide crowd" if any are out there, I highly recommend this piece: https://thenextweb.com/news/read-this-if-youve-got-nothing-to-hide
